message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $115. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. In that case, I'm willing to consider $105 for the product. It's still a bit above your proposed price, but I hope this meets somewhere in between our expectations.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, I'm still a bit tight on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $102.50. That's the lowest I can go.
